Name: Wolfkin Tales Pt One - Old Wolf Galuf
Author: ZennpaiSkoll
Description:
Old Wolf Galuf

This turns Galuf into an Old Wolfkin. His tail was cut off whatever that implies...
He has custom sprites for each class and sadly this includes his Dead Classes, those you couldn't use without cheats.

Known issues

Possible minor clippings might be visible
Like other replacer mods that is was inspired by, Ailments do not show up. I.e Petrification, Poison, ect.
(Last I check this was unsolved.)
Let me know if you find any other issues.
